title: Cover, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: weft-faced plain weave patterned by weft bands and bands of double interlocked tapestry weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 130 x 79 cm (51 3/16 x 31 1/8 in.)
description: Wide red, white and blue weft stripes with red, white, blue yellow and metallic striped centers. Five intermittent bands of tapestry in blue, pink, yellow and metallic thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: weft-faced plain weave patterned by weft bands and bands of double interlocked tapestry weave. 1969-98-14-a.
